C

Constants - Class in org.example.lab.agh
The Constants class defines constant values used throughout the application.

L

Library - Class in org.example.lab.agh
The Library class represents a shared resource where readers and writers interact.
Library(int, int) - Constructor for class org.example.lab.agh.Library
Constructs a new Library instance with the specified number of readers and writers.

O

org.example.lab.agh - package org.example.lab.agh
 

R

Reader - Class in org.example.lab.agh
The Reader class represents a reader thread in the library simulation.
Reader(Integer, Semaphore, Semaphore, Semaphore, Library) - Constructor for class org.example.lab.agh.Reader
Constructs a new Reader instance with the given ID and semaphores.
run() - Method in class org.example.lab.agh.Reader
The main execution method of the reader thread.
run() - Method in class org.example.lab.agh.Writer
The main execution method of the writer thread.
runApp() - Method in class org.example.lab.agh.Library
Starts the application by creating and starting reader and writer threads.

Handles the exit of a reader from the library.

T

TIME_SPENT_NOT_READING - Static variable in class org.example.lab.agh.Constants
The time spent not reading (idle time) by a reader in milliseconds.
TIME_SPENT_NOT_WRITING - Static variable in class org.example.lab.agh.Constants
The time spent not writing (idle time) by a writer in milliseconds.
TIME_SPENT_READING - Static variable in class org.example.lab.agh.Constants
The time spent reading by a reader in milliseconds.
TIME_SPENT_WRITING - Static variable in class org.example.lab.agh.Constants
The time spent writing by a writer in milliseconds.
